pages.text: $(o)Waiting for Phantoms to appear naturally is a pain. Let me offer an alternative. There is a Power unlike the others, a $(l:intro/curse)dark Power$(/l). While Mind is being consumed by it under the shadow of the night, killing any non-undead being near the Crucible will bring one about. $(br2)Their flesh makes for a good renewable source of Mind, and the byproduct is quite sticky.
$(o)I wonder if it could be $(4)transmuted into something useful$(0)? $(br2)If so, the best bet would be to experiment with $(4)dissolved plants$(0).
